title.narrative: (UTH) Global Nation: Fostering Fresh Thinking on History, Peace, Reconciliation, and Development in Myanmar (Second Phase), engagement

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

policy-marker.narrative: Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Fostering fresh thinking on Myanmar’s options for peace, reconciliation, and development by introducing Myanmar public to more critical and connected views of Myanmar and global history.

description.narrative: New and improved discussions on peace, reconciliation, and development.

title.narrative: An increasingly better understanding of Myanmar’s history in connection with global history; a more critical appreciation of history and more critical approach to received nationalist narratives, especially on the part of young people in Myanmar.
